attributes.name: span
attributes.desc: number of column the grid spans

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: number of spacing on the left side of the grid

attributes.name: push
attributes.desc: number of columns that grid moves to the right

attributes.name: pull
attributes.desc: number of columns that grid moves to the left

attributes.name: xs
attributes.desc: `<768px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: sm
attributes.desc: `≥768px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: md
attributes.desc: `≥992px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: lg
attributes.desc: `≥1200px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: xl
attributes.desc: `≥1920px` Responsive columns or column props object
